DOC.brief_summary: The investigator investigate effect supervise maternal exercise training program ( perform 2nd 3rd trimester pregnancy ) maternal-newborn unit health outcome group previously sedentary healthy woman . A matched control group assess time period . Given fact study field use aerobic exercise , investigator largely focus light resistance , tone exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Resistance Exercise Training During Pregnancy : Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: sedentary ( exercise > 20 minute > 3 day per week ) singleton high risk preterm delivery ( one previous preterm delivery ) woman plan give birth obstetrics hospital department ( Hospital Severo Ochoa , Madrid , Spain ) medical followup throughout entire pregnancy period include study woman serious medical condition prevent exercise safely
